home.french-makers: FRENCH CRAFTERS OF WHIPS AND PARACORD ITEMS

color-chart.paragraph-1: Here is the list of paracord colors with which we already worked with with our associated creations. This will allow you to see better the different renderings possible.

color-chart.paragraph-2.2: to inform you and support you in your project.

contact-page.title: We will be happy to answer your questions
contact-page.subtitle: Whether to guide you on your project or to place an order, do not hesitate ! We are available for you, and we thank you for your interest.

etsy.description: Visit our shop, browse our creations and find the inspiration which will make your order perfect for you!

instagram.description: Discover us over time, and be the firsts to know about our new projects. We love to share daily with our followers!

email.description: Discuss your project with us, and let us guide you on the details that will suit you best!
